## Steps to Contribute

Fork the repo to your private repo (ie https://github.corp.ebay.com/sizu/commons-inc)

Clone the repo (ie replace EBAY_GIT_AUTH_TOKEN in the following command - git clone https://EBAY_GIT_AUTH_TOKEN:x-oauth-basic@github.corp.ebay.com/sizu/commons-inc)

Make changes, run tests:

```sh
cd commons-inc
npm config set registry http://npm.corp.ebay.com
npm install
npm test
```

After tests pass, commit changes

## Notes
To run one test, use it.only()
Do not use tabs, use four spaces
atom.io is a common editor used
"Test Headers page-info should not log for pre-prod" randomly throws "Uncaught Error: Parse Error".  If seen, re-run tests
"Test Headers after all hook" randomly throws "Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property isPending of undefined".  If see, re-run tests
In utils.js file, I added requires.  As such, I had to update dependencies in package.json via:

```sh
npm install app-context-ebay -S
npm install environment-ebay -S
```
